alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 1:38PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts from 60 to 70 mph expected. Local gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Lower elevations of central and northern Arizona. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will develop behind a cold front on Wednesday, causing areas of blowing snow and poor visibility.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
